/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the image. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
